security_audit.summary: Clinical documentation skill with 8 Python validation scripts. All scripts are standard text processing tools for report validation and template generation. No network calls, no external commands, no obfuscated code. Filesystem access is limited to local file operations for report processing.

content.user_title: Write clinical reports with compliance validation
content.value_statement: Healthcare professionals need to create accurate, regulation-compliant clinical documentation but struggle with complex guidelines and verification. This skill provides CARE-compliant case report templates, HIPAA de-identification checks, and validation tools for clinical trial documents.
actual_capabilities: Generate 12 professional clinical report templates including case reports, SOAP notes, discharge summaries, and diagnostic reports
Validate case reports against CARE guidelines checklist with 12 required elements
Scan documents for 18 HIPAA identifiers to ensure proper de-identification
Check clinical trial reports for ICH-E3 structure compliance
Validate medical terminology and detect prohibited abbreviations from JCAHO list
Format adverse event data into publication-ready summary tables
limitations: Does not provide medical advice or clinical decision support
Does not connect to electronic health record systems
Does not validate medical coding against official terminologies (SNOMED, LOINC, ICD-10)
Templates require manual completion with patient-specific information

use_cases.title: Publish case reports
use_cases.description: Create CARE-compliant case reports for medical journal submission with proper de-identification

use_cases.title: Document trial safety
use_cases.description: Write SAE reports and clinical study reports meeting ICH-E3 and FDA regulatory requirements

use_cases.title: Standardize documentation
use_cases.description: Generate consistent radiology, pathology, and laboratory reports using professional templates

prompt_templates.title: Basic case report
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a clinical case report template for a patient with [condition]. Include sections for introduction, patient information, clinical findings, diagnostic assessment, treatment, and follow-up.

prompt_templates.title: Check compliance
prompt_templates.prompt: Check my clinical case report for HIPAA compliance. Identify any of the 18 protected health information identifiers that need to be removed or modified.

prompt_templates.title: Clinical trial document
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a serious adverse event report template for a clinical trial participant. Include all required elements for regulatory submission.

prompt_templates.title: Patient notes
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a SOAP note template for a [follow-up/initial] visit. Include subjective, objective, assessment, and plan sections with placeholders.

output_examples.input: Create a clinical case report for a 65-year-old patient with atypical pneumonia presentation
output: Structure: Title, Abstract, Introduction, Patient Information, Clinical Findings, Timeline, Diagnostic Assessment, Therapeutic Interventions, Follow-up and Outcomes, Discussion, Informed Consent Statement
Note: Remember to remove all HIPAA identifiers before publication

best_practices: Always verify de-identification before sharing or publishing any clinical document
Obtain and document informed consent before creating case reports for publication
Use the validation scripts to check compliance before regulatory submission
Follow institutional guidelines for clinical documentation standards
anti_patterns: Publishing clinical documents without removing all 18 HIPAA identifiers
Skipping the informed consent documentation step for case reports
Submitting clinical trial reports without validating against ICH-E3 structure
Using prohibited abbreviations from the JCAHO Do Not Use list

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with all electronic health record systems?
faq.answer: This skill creates standalone documents in Markdown format. You can copy content to any EHR system that accepts text input.

faq.question: What are the word count requirements for case reports?
faq.answer: Most journals require 1500-3500 words for case reports. The validation script checks word count against these guidelines.

faq.question: Does this skill integrate with reference management tools?
faq.answer: The skill is designed to integrate with citation management skills for adding references to case reports.

faq.question: Is patient data stored or transmitted anywhere?
faq.answer: No. All processing happens locally on your machine. Patient data is never sent to external servers.

faq.question: What do I do if HIPAA identifiers are detected?
faq.answer: Review the violation report showing locations of potential identifiers. Remove, redact, or modify the information before publication.

faq.question: How does this compare to other medical writing tools?
faq.answer: This skill focuses on structured clinical documentation with built-in compliance validation. It complements general writing tools by providing medical-specific templates and checks.
